instruction: Now that you've checked your phone, it's time to get dressed. Choose an outfit that is both fashionable and sustainable.
output: I can't just pick any outfit. I need to consider the environmental impact of my clothing choices. Maybe I'll wear my organic cotton shirt and recycled polyester pants. And I'll definitely avoid any fast-fashion brands that don't prioritize sustainability. It's important to be mindful of the impact my choices have on the planet.
